meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a ghoul.
meanings.sent1: The ghoulish figure in the movie scared me.
meanings.sent2: Her ghoulish makeup for Halloween was very realistic.
meanings.sent3: He joked about wearing a ghoulish costume to the party.
meanings.sent4: The abandoned house had a ghoulish atmosphere, like something out of a horror story.
meanings.sent5: The ghoulish shadows cast by the flickering candle added to the eerie ambiance.

meanings.definition: Suggestive of or fascinated by death and the macabre.
meanings.sent1: The ghoulish decorations at the haunted house were spine-chilling.
meanings.sent2: She had a ghoulish fascination with true crime stories.
meanings.sent3: The ghoulish theme of the party made everyone shiver with excitement.
meanings.sent4: His ghoulish sense of humor always involved dark jokes about ghosts and zombies.
meanings.sent5: The ghoulish music playing in the background set a haunting mood for the evening.
